company.name: Yevacure Pharmaceutical Pvt Ltd
company.description: Yevacure Pharmaceutical Pvt Ltd is a leading pharmaceutical company based in Ghaziabad, UP, India. We specialize in manufacturing high-quality skincare, haircare, body care, and pet care products. Our ISO-certified products are dermatologically tested and cruelty-free, ensuring the highest standards of quality and safety.
company.longDescription: Founded in 2020, Yevacure Pharmaceutical Pvt Ltd has established itself as a trusted name in the pharmaceutical industry. We are committed to delivering science-backed solutions that promote health and wellness. Our product range includes gentle facewashes, herbal shampoos, moisturizers, body lotions, sunscreens, hair serums, body washes, and specialized pet care products. All our products are manufactured in GMP-compliant facilities and undergo rigorous quality testing.
company.address: #UG15 HRC SHOPPING COMPLEX UPPER, GROUND FLOOR GH PLOT NO 1/2 VAIBHAV KHAND, INDIRAPURAM, GHAZIABAD, Uttar Pradesh 201014, India

products.name: YC FACIUM Glutathione Face Wash
products.shortDescription: Enriched with Glutathione, Aloe Vera, and Vitamin C & E Complex for brightening and whitening.
products.longDescription: YC FACIUM Glutathione Face Wash is a revolutionary skincare product that combines the power of Glutathione with Aloe Vera and Vitamin C & E Complex. This advanced formula provides comprehensive skin benefits including brightening, whitening, and antioxidant protection. Suitable for all types of skin, this face wash is designed to give you radiant, healthy-looking skin with regular use.
features: Enriched with Glutathione for skin brightening
Contains Aloe Vera for soothing and hydration
Vitamin C & E Complex for antioxidant protection

image.alt: YC FACIUM Glutathione Face Wash - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Wet your face with water. Apply a small amount of face wash and massage gently in circular motions for 30-60 seconds. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use twice daily for best results.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
compliance.regulatory: Compliant with ISO guidelines for cosmetic products

products.usp: Triple power brightening formula for radiant skin

products.name: YC FACIUM Glutathione Skin Glowing Cream
products.shortDescription: Skin glowing cream with the power of Glutathione for brightening, whitening, and Vitamin C & E Complex.
products.longDescription: YC FACIUM Glutathione Skin Glowing Cream is formulated with advanced ingredients to brighten and nourish your skin. Enriched with Glutathione, this cream provides powerful antioxidant benefits while Vitamin C & E Complex enhances skin radiance and protects against environmental damage. Perfect for all skin types, this lightweight cream absorbs quickly and delivers visible results.
features: Suitable for all types of skin

image.alt: YC FACIUM Glutathione Skin Glowing Cream - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Apply a small amount to clean, dry face and neck. Massage gently in upward circular motions until fully absorbed. Use twice daily for best results.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: YC FACIUM Face Serum
products.shortDescription: Advance Anti-Ageing Formula for brightening, heals skin, and prevents ageing.
products.longDescription: YC FACIUM Face Serum is a premium anti-ageing solution that combines advanced ingredients to combat signs of ageing while brightening and healing your skin. This concentrated serum penetrates deep into the skin layers to provide intensive care, reduce fine lines, and restore youthful radiance.

image.alt: YC FACIUM Face Serum - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Apply 2-3 drops to clean face and neck. Gently massage until absorbed. Use morning and evening before moisturizer. Follow with sunscreen during the day.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Store in a cool place.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: EBODERM Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
products.shortDescription: Ketoconazole & Zinc Pyrithione Shampoo for effective dandruff control.
products.longDescription: EBODERM Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is a clinically proven formula containing Ketoconazole and Zinc Pyrithione to effectively combat dandruff and scalp conditions. This therapeutic shampoo not only treats dandruff but also helps maintain a healthy scalp environment, preventing recurrence.
products.usage: Wet hair thoroughly. Apply shampoo and massage into scalp. Leave on for 3-5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. Use 2-3 times per week or as directed by physician.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Discontinue if irritation develops. Keep out of reach of children.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: HAIRSALUS 5% Minoxidil Topical Solution
products.shortDescription: Hair Regrowth Treatment that revitalizes hair follicles and stimulates growth.
products.longDescription: HAIRSALUS 5% is a clinically proven Minoxidil topical solution designed for hair regrowth treatment. This alcohol-free formula revitalizes hair follicles, stimulates growth, and is clinically proven to help regrow hair. Extra strength formulation provides effective results for both men and women experiencing hair loss.
products.usage: Apply 1ml twice daily directly to the scalp in the area of hair thinning. Massage gently. Wash hands after application. Do not rinse. Use continuously for best results.
products.warnings: For external use only. For use on scalp only. Avoid contact with eyes. May cause temporary scalp irritation. Consult doctor if pregnant or breastfeeding. Keep out of reach of children.

compliance.storage: Store at room temperature away from heat

products.name: COLTIHAIR Tablets
products.shortDescription: Biotin, Amino Acids, Iron, Vitamins, Minerals & Grape Seed Extract for healthy hair.
products.longDescription: COLTIHAIR Tablets are a comprehensive nutraceutical supplement designed to promote healthy hair from within. This advanced formula combines Biotin, essential Amino Acids, Iron, Vitamins, Minerals, and Grape Seed Extract to nourish hair follicles, strengthen hair, and support overall hair health.
products.usage: Take 1 tablet daily after meals or as directed by healthcare professional. Do not exceed recommended dosage.
products.warnings: Food supplement, not for medicinal use. Consult doctor if pregnant, nursing, or on medication. Keep out of reach of children. Do not exceed recommended dose.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: YC TRUNCLE Hair Serum
products.shortDescription: Specially designed to nourish and smooth hair, leaving it shiny, soft, and manageable.
products.longDescription: YC TRUNCLE Hair Serum is a premium hair care solution that delivers salon-quality results at home. This advanced serum is formulated to nourish, smooth, and protect your hair while adding brilliant shine and manageability. Perfect for all hair types, it helps tame frizz and provides long-lasting nourishment.

image.alt: YC TRUNCLE Hair Serum - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Apply a few drops to damp or dry hair. Distribute evenly through mid-lengths to ends. Style as desired. Do not rinse. Use daily for best results.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool place.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: YC PIEDOCARE - Good Bye Fungi!
products.shortDescription: Prevents your feet from fungal infections with Natural Lavender, Lemon and Rosemary extract.
products.longDescription: YC PIEDOCARE is a specialized foot care solution designed to prevent and treat fungal infections. Formulated with natural ingredients including Lavender, Lemon, and Rosemary extracts, this spray provides effective protection while being gentle on the skin. Perfect for maintaining healthy, fungi-free feet.

image.alt: YC PIEDOCARE Foot Care Spray - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Spray directly on clean, dry feet, focusing on areas between toes and soles. Use twice daily or as needed. Allow to dry before wearing socks or shoes.
products.warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes, mucous membranes, and damaged skin. Do not use if allergic to ingredients. Keep away from children. Do not spray near fire or flame.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool place away from heat

products.name: YC SERENE SOFT Moisturising Body Lotion
products.shortDescription: Enriched with Aloe Vera & Vitamin E for daily care of sensitive skin.
products.longDescription: YC SERENE SOFT Moisturising Body Lotion is specially formulated for sensitive skin. Enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this non-greasy body lotion provides deep hydration while relieving skin dryness. The gentle formula is suitable for all skin types and is specially recommended for use after washing and bathing.

image.alt: YC SERENE SOFT Body Lotion - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Specially recommended for use after washing and bathing. Massage this richly formulated skin lotion gently on body and face or as advised by your dermatologist. Protect from heat and direct sunlight.
products.warnings: For external use only. Protect from heat and direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.
products.manufacturer: Manufactured by: Hanssan Healthcare Pvt Ltd. Marketed by: Yevacure Pharmaceutical Private Limited

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.usp: Gentle moisturizing lotion for sensitive skin

products.name: YEVAHEP-DS Syrup - Herbal Liver Tonic
products.shortDescription: A Herbal Liver Tonic - Sugar Free Ayurvedic Medicine for liver health.
products.longDescription: YEVAHEP-DS Syrup is a comprehensive herbal liver tonic formulated using Ayurvedic principles. This sugar-free formulation supports liver health, aids in detoxification, and helps maintain optimal liver function. Perfect for those looking for natural liver support without added sugar.

image.alt: YEVAHEP-DS Liver Tonic Syrup - Yevacure Pharmaceutical

products.usage: Adults: 2 teaspoons (10ml) twice daily after meals or as directed by physician. Children: As advised by physician.
products.warnings: Store in a cool, dry place. Shake well before use. Keep out of reach of children. Consult physician if symptoms persist.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: YEVAMOX-CV Tablets
products.shortDescription: Amoxycillin & Potassium Clavulanate Tablets IP 625mg for bacterial infections.
products.longDescription: YEVAMOX-CV Tablets contain Amoxycillin and Potassium Clavulanate, a powerful combination antibiotic used to treat a wide range of bacterial infections. This prescription medication is effective against bacteria resistant to amoxicillin alone, providing comprehensive antibacterial coverage.
products.usage: Take as prescribed by physician. Usually 1 tablet twice or thrice daily. Complete the full course even if symptoms improve. Take with food to reduce stomach upset.
products.warnings: Prescription medicine. Take only as directed by physician. Complete full course. May cause allergic reactions. Inform doctor of any allergies. Keep out of reach of children. Not for viral infections.

compliance.storage: Store in a cool, dry place below 25°C
